We have some exciting last chances to share with you: the countdown to the final days of our **Early Access User** Program has officially begun, and it will conclude on **November 9th**!





**Support us: [https://community.affine.pro/c/insider-general/](https://community.affine.pro/c/insider-general/)**



![sZhjGEoVGq_G91bDGhPTGEaeZFi1lsTUGHlY-pBP2os=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/sZhjGEoVGq_G91bDGhPTGEaeZFi1lsTUGHlY-pBP2os=)





# **What benefits await early access sponsors?**


### **1.Get a head start with Unlock the Boundless Potential of AFFiNE Cloud**


During this period, you'll have an exclusive chance to explore AFFiNE Cloud and experience its groundbreaking features firsthand.


* **Collaboration**: We have just rolled out an exciting new collaboration feature that empowers **multiple users to work together in real time**. With this feature, you can simultaneously edit, make modifications to task progress and deadlines, and collaborate on presentations, all within AFFiNE. And that's not all - there are even more remarkable features waiting for you to explore!


  
![O88V12dZ7eALpdMD8-6eyyfRec5yZyWiQxCnvNEb3r0=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/O88V12dZ7eALpdMD8-6eyyfRec5yZyWiQxCnvNEb3r0=)


* **Multi-Endpoint Real-time Sync**: Stay synchronized across all your devices in real-time, no matter where you are. Even when offline, your changes will seamlessly sync once you're back online.



![81XTQI-d-Le-DP8jZwI5uGem89KLPUKeYXmmGeRcHCE=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/81XTQI-d-Le-DP8jZwI5uGem89KLPUKeYXmmGeRcHCE=)


* **Reliable Offline Capability**: Our Offline Support ensures uninterrupted work, even during internet disruptions.



![re72pCW0_OP8yctTXT2gXUXC9J6wLqAh-bLN8IZNjCM=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/re72pCW0_OP8yctTXT2gXUXC9J6wLqAh-bLN8IZNjCM=)


* **Unrivaled Privacy:** Your data's security is our top priority. AFFiNE Cloud meticulously encrypts and securely stores all your workspace information.



![BMwhnBD8bfuBzKi2a16kVAnuilh8vwJFh1a4oEntMB8=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/BMwhnBD8bfuBzKi2a16kVAnuilh8vwJFh1a4oEntMB8=)


More details: [https://affine.pro/blog/what-is-new-affine-0922](https://affine.pro/blog/what-is-new-affine-0922)





### **2.Recurring 50% Discount**


Your commitment deserves appreciation. Benefit from a lasting 50% discount as long as you continue to find value in your subscription.





### **3.One-Year Free Pro Plan**


Enjoy a complimentary one-year premium AFFiNE Pro Plan subscription, packed with advanced tools to boost your productivity and creativity.


How to become our early access sponsor? To become an early access sponsor through [https://community.affine.pro/c/insider-general/](https://community.affine.pro/c/insider-general/).





# Next Steps after being an early access sponsor


1. Download the **0.9.0 Beta Version** from our website: [https://affine.pro/download](https://affine.pro/download)


1. After becoming a sponsor, you will receive an email from the AFFiNE team confirming that your **email address has been added to the whitelist**. You can log in to AFFiNE with this email. Additionally, you have the option to sign in using your Google account.


1. For more information, FAQ is here to help: [https://insider.affine.pro/share/af3478a2-9c9c-4d16-864d-bffa1eb10eb6/wJ-CCaV-D3](https://insider.affine.pro/share/af3478a2-9c9c-4d16-864d-bffa1eb10eb6/wJ-CCaV-D3)





Should you encounter any difficulties, rest assured that our community is here to assist you at any time: [https://community.affine.pro/home](https://community.affine.pro/home).





Thank you once more for being an integral part of the AFFiNE community. Your trust means the world to us.
